purpose: Outline the topics and contents of the report.
title: Digital trends and landscape report – Topics and contents

tables.title: Mastercard Advisors Digital Trends and Landscape report
tables.description: Table outlining topics covered and their descriptions.

cells: Impact of digital in the financial services industry and the importance of digital transformation
Digital banking overview and market evolution
Key digital trends for financial services in relevant markets for client
High-level overview of customers engagement aspects and preferences in digital financial services
Competitive environment in relevant markets: established players, digital players, fintechs etc.
Overview of “best in class” solutions and applicability and disruptive potential of emerging technologies in industry
Regulatory environment in the local market related to digital financial services industry
Local market assessment and key uncertainties
Local market dynamics (customer, competition and regulation) and articulation of key uncertainties that shape the digital financial services industry
